blueprint.description: Installs VLC on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [VLC](https://www.videolan.org/) media player is a free and open-source, portable, cross-platform media player software, and streaming media server developed by the VideoLAN project. VLC is available for desktop operating systems, and mobile platforms, such as Android, iOS, iPadOS, Tizen, Windows 10 Mobile, and Windows Phone.
blueprint.name: VLC Media Player
blueprint.title: VLC Media Player
